cards.name: The Fool
cards.upright: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit. A leap of faith into the unknown with optimism and trust.
cards.reversed: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration. Acting foolishly without thinking of consequences.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action. You have the tools and ability to achieve your goals.
cards.reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents. Misuse of skills or lack of focus preventing manifestation.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind. Trust your inner voice and wisdom.
cards.reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal. Ignoring inner wisdom or information being withheld.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance. Creative expression and connection to the senses.
cards.reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, emptiness. Neglecting self-care or feeling smothered.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.upright: Authority, establishment, structure, father figure. Taking control through leadership and strategic planning.
cards.reversed: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline. Rigidity or abuse of power creating conflict.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition. Seeking counsel from established institutions or mentors.
cards.reversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo. Rebelling against tradition or restricting dogma.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices. Deep connections and important decisions about partnerships.
cards.reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values. Relationship struggles or difficult choices ahead.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.upright: Control, willpower, success, action, determination. Overcoming obstacles through focus and confidence.
cards.reversed: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction. Losing control or being pulled in too many directions.

cards.name: Strength
cards.upright: Courage, persuasion, influence, compassion. Inner strength and gentle control overcoming brute force.
cards.reversed: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion. Lacking confidence or acting from weakness.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.upright: Soul-searching, introspection, inner guidance, solitude. Withdrawing to find answers within yourself.
cards.reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal from loved ones. Excessive isolation or refusing guidance from others.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point. A significant change or stroke of fortune coming.
cards.reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles. Setbacks or inability to control external forces.

cards.name: Justice
cards.upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law. Accountability and fair treatment in legal or moral matters.
cards.reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty. Avoiding consequences or experiencing unjust treatment.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.upright: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives. Willing sacrifice and seeing things from a new angle.
cards.reversed: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision. Refusing to make necessary sacrifices or feeling stuck.

cards.name: Death
cards.upright: Endings, change, transformation, transition. A major phase ending to make way for new beginnings.
cards.reversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging. Fear of change or incomplete transitions.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, meaning. Finding the middle path and blending opposing forces harmoniously.
cards.reversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment. Overindulgence or loss of equilibrium requiring adjustment.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.upright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality. Bondage to material desires or unhealthy patterns.
cards.reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment. Breaking free from addictions or restrictions.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening. Dramatic disruption destroying false foundations.
cards.reversed: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster. Resisting necessary change or narrowly avoiding catastrophe.

cards.name: The Star
cards.upright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality. Renewed faith and inspiration after difficult times.
cards.reversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection. Feeling hopeless or losing sight of your purpose.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition. Uncertainty and deception requiring deep introspection.
cards.reversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion. Unveiling illusions or confronting hidden anxieties.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.upright: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality. Joy, clarity, and celebration of life's blessings.
cards.reversed: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic. Temporary setbacks or unable to see the positive side.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.upright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution. Awakening to your higher calling and making amends.
cards.reversed: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call. Harsh self-judgment or refusing to heed your inner voice.

cards.name: The World
cards.upright: Completion, accomplishment, travel, fulfillment. Achievement of goals and successful conclusion of a cycle.
cards.reversed: Seeking personal closure, short-cuts, delays. Incomplete cycles or resisting the end of a chapter.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.upright: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential. A creative spark or exciting new venture beginning.
cards.reversed: Emerging ideas, lack of direction, distractions. Delays in plans or struggling to find your path.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.upright: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery. Planning your next steps with the world at your fingertips.
cards.reversed: Personal goals, inner alignment, fear of unknown. Hesitation or lack of planning preventing progress.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.upright: Progress, expansion, foresight, overseas opportunities. Your efforts are beginning to bear fruit.
cards.reversed: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays. Obstacles preventing expansion or limited vision.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.upright: Celebration, joy, harmony, relaxation, homecoming. A happy event or milestone worth celebrating.
cards.reversed: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others. Tensions disrupting harmony or postponed celebrations.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.upright: Conflict, disagreements, competition, tension, diversity. Clashing perspectives creating constructive or destructive friction.
cards.reversed: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, releasing tension. Resolving disputes or avoiding necessary confrontation.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.upright: Success, public recognition, progress, self-confidence. Victory and acknowledgment for your achievements.
cards.reversed: Private achievement, self-definition, fall from grace. Lack of recognition or ego preventing success.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.upright: Challenge, competition, protection, perseverance. Defending your position against opposition with courage.
cards.reversed: Exhaustion, giving up, overwhelmed. Feeling defenseless or lacking the energy to fight.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.upright: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment. Swift progress and things falling into place quickly.
cards.reversed: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment. Slowed progress or rushed decisions causing problems.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.upright: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith. Standing strong despite fatigue and ongoing challenges.
cards.reversed: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive. Exhaustion or paranoia preventing final push.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.upright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion. Carrying a heavy load as you near the finish line.
cards.reversed: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation. Releasing burdens or refusing to delegate.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.upright: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit. Enthusiastic exploration of new creative ventures.
cards.reversed: Newly formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting. Lacking direction or inconsistent with plans.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.upright: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness. Charging forward with enthusiasm and confidence.
cards.reversed: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays. Recklessness or impatience causing setbacks.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.upright: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination. Charismatic leadership and passionate engagement.
cards.reversed: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, re-establish sense of self. Insecurity or domineering behavior.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.upright: Natural-born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honor. Bold leadership and inspiring others to action.
cards.reversed: Impulsiveness, haste, ruthless, high expectations. Tyrannical behavior or lack of follow-through.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.upright: Love, new relationships, compassion, creativity. An outpouring of emotional, spiritual, or creative energy.
cards.reversed: Self-love, intuition, repressed emotions. Blocked emotions or turning inward for fulfillment.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.upright: Unified love, partnership, mutual attraction. Deep connection and balanced relationship forming.
cards.reversed: Self-love, break-ups, disharmony, distrust. Relationship imbalance or incompatibility.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.upright: Celebration, friendship, creativity, collaborations. Joyful gatherings and social connections.
cards.reversed: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, 'three's a crowd'. Overindulgence or social isolation.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.upright: Meditation, contemplation, apathy, reevaluation. Introspection and reassessing what brings fulfillment.
cards.reversed: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment. Renewed interest or ending period of apathy.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.upright: Regret, failure, disappointment, pessimism. Dwelling on loss while overlooking what remains.
cards.reversed: Personal setbacks, self-forgiveness, moving on. Accepting loss and finding peace.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.upright: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy. Nostalgia and reconnection with simpler times.
cards.reversed: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness. Stuck in memories or needing to release the past.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.upright: Opportunities, choices, wishful thinking, illusion. Multiple options creating confusion or fantasy.
cards.reversed: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices. Gaining clarity or facing reality.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.upright: Disappointment, abandonment, withdrawal, escapism. Leaving behind what no longer serves you.
cards.reversed: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting. Fear of moving on or premature abandonment.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.upright: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true. Emotional fulfillment and getting what you want.
cards.reversed: Inner happiness, materialism, dissatisfaction, indulgence. Unfulfilled despite external success.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.upright: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment. Complete emotional fulfillment and happy family.
cards.reversed: Disconnection, misaligned values, struggling relationships. Disharmony or seeking deeper meaning.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.upright: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility. A gentle invitation to explore feelings.
cards.reversed: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks. Emotional immaturity or ignoring inner voice.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.upright: Creativity, romance, charm, imagination, beauty. Following your heart with romantic idealism.
cards.reversed: Overactive imagination, unrealistic, jealous, moody. Moodiness or living in fantasy.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.upright: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow. Nurturing emotional wisdom and empathy.
cards.reversed: Inner feelings, self-care, self-love, co-dependency. Emotional manipulation or neglecting self.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.upright: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, diplomatic. Mastery of emotions with wisdom and control.
cards.reversed: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative. Emotional volatility or coldness.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.upright: Breakthroughs, new ideas, mental clarity, success. A powerful moment of insight and truth.
cards.reversed: Inner clarity, re-thinking an idea, clouded judgment. Confusion or destructive use of intellect.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.upright: Difficult decisions, weighing up options, an impasse, avoidance. Stalemate requiring a choice.
cards.reversed: Indecision, confusion, information overload, stalemate. Avoiding a necessary decision.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.upright: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt. Painful truth or loss cutting deep.
cards.reversed: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness. Healing from heartbreak or holding grudges.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.upright: Rest, relaxation, meditation, contemplation, recuperation. Taking time to recharge and recover.
cards.reversed: Exhaustion, burn-out, deep contemplation, stagnation. Restlessness or inability to rest.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.upright: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs. Hollow victory or bitter conflict.
cards.reversed: Reconciliation, making amends, past resentment. Moving past conflict or ongoing grudges.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.upright: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage. Moving toward calmer waters and healing.
cards.reversed: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business. Delayed transition or refusing to move on.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.upright: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically. Cunning strategy or dishonesty.
cards.reversed: Imposter syndrome, self-deceit, keeping secrets. Coming clean or suffering from guilt.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.upright: Negative thoughts, self-imposed restriction, imprisonment, victim mentality. Feeling trapped by limiting beliefs.
cards.reversed: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts. Breaking free from mental prison.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.upright: Anxiety, worry, fear, depression, nightmares. Mental anguish and overwhelming negative thoughts.
cards.reversed: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry. Facing fears or ongoing anxiety.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.upright: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis. Rock bottom moment signaling new beginning.
cards.reversed: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end. Surviving crisis or refusing to let go.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.upright: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating. Mental agility and vigilance.
cards.reversed: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haphazard action. Gossip or lacking follow-through.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.upright: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking. Charging ahead with assertive intellect.
cards.reversed: Restless, unfocused, impulsive, burn-out. Aggressive communication or reckless haste.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.upright: Independent, unbiased judgment, clear boundaries, direct communication. Sharp intellect with emotional detachment.
cards.reversed: Overly-emotional, easily influenced, bitter, cold-hearted. Harsh judgment or emotional cruelty.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.upright: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth. Ethical leadership through logic and reason.
cards.reversed: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation. Abuse of authority or cruel intellect.

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.upright: A new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance. Seeds of prosperity being planted.
cards.reversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight. Missed chances or poor financial decisions.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.upright: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritization, adaptability. Juggling responsibilities with flexibility.
cards.reversed: Over-committed, disorganization, reprioritization. Losing balance or dropping the ball.

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.upright: Teamwork, collaboration, learning, implementation. Working together toward shared goals.
cards.reversed: Disharmony, misalignment, working alone. Lack of coordination or solo efforts.

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.upright: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control. Holding tight to resources or status.
cards.reversed: Over-spending, greed, self-protection. Releasing control or excessive hoarding.

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.upright: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry. Hardship and feeling left out in the cold.
cards.reversed: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty. Finding help or recovering from loss.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.upright: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity. Balanced exchange and acts of kindness.
cards.reversed: Self-care, unpaid debts, one-sided charity. Strings attached or unequal giving.

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.upright: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment. Pausing to assess progress and growth.
cards.reversed: Lack of long-term vision, limited success, impatience. Questioning investments or wanting quick results.

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.upright: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development. Dedication to craftsmanship and learning.
cards.reversed: Self-development, perfectionism, misdirected activity. Unfocused efforts or lack of ambition.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.upright: Abundance, luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence. Enjoying the fruits of your labor.
cards.reversed: Self-worth, over-investment in work, hustling. Overworking or tying worth to possessions.

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.upright: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution. Lasting prosperity and legacy.
cards.reversed: The dark side of wealth, financial failure, loneliness. Family disputes or losing wealth.

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.upright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development, new job. Grounded enthusiasm for learning.
cards.reversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure. Unfocused or poor planning.

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.upright: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism, methodical. Steady, reliable progress toward goals.
cards.reversed: Self-discipline, boredom, feeling 'stuck', perfectionism. Workaholic tendencies or stagnation.

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.upright: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent. Grounded abundance and caregiving.
cards.reversed: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict. Smothering or materialism.

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.upright: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance. Mastery of material world with generosity.
cards.reversed: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth, stubborn. Greed or poor financial management.
